Both of these movies are excellent choices, but if you're looking for something a bit more action-packed, "Hudson Hawk" might be just what you need! This movie stars Danny Aiello and Andrew Bryniarski, among others, and features plenty of excitement and adventure. 💥

I hope these recommendations are helpful, and I wish you a wonderful movie-watching experience!
